text: So, brothers and sisters, I could not speak to you as spiritual people, but instead as people of the flesh, as infants in Christ.

I <st data-num="4222" class="">fed</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1051" class="">milk</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="1033">solid food</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> you were <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">ready</st>. <st data-num="235">In fact</st>, you are <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">ready</st>,

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="4559" class="">influenced by the flesh</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">since</st> there is still <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2054" class="">dissension</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> you <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="4559">influenced by the flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">behaving</st> <st data-num="2596">like</st> <st data-num="444">unregenerate people</st>?<n id="2" />
For whenever someone says, “I am with Paul,” or “I am with Apollos,” are you not merely human?
What is Apollos, really? Or what is Paul? Servants through whom you came to believe, and each of us in the ministry the Lord gave us.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5452" class="">planted</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="625" class="">Apollos</st> <st data-num="4222" class="">watered</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="837" class="">caused</st> it <st data-num="837">to grow</st>.

<st data-num="5620" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> the one who <st data-num="5452" class="">plants</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">counts</st> for <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> the one who <st data-num="4222" class="">waters</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="837">causes the growth</st>.

The one who <st data-num="5452" class="">plants</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="4222" class="">waters</st> <st data-num="1510">work as</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3408" class="">reward</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">according</st> to <st data-num="2398" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2873" class="">work</st>.

We <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4904" class="">coworkers</st> belonging to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="1" /> You <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1091" class="">field</st>, <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="3619" class="">building</st>.

<st data-num="2596" class="">According to</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="4680" class="">skilled</st> <st data-num="753" class="">master-builder</st> I <st data-num="5087" class="">laid</st> a <st data-num="2310" class="">foundation</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="243">someone else</st> <st data-num="2026" class="">builds</st> on it. <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1538">each one</st> must be <st data-num="991" class="">careful</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> he <st data-num="2026" class="">builds</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">lay</st> any <st data-num="2310" class="">foundation</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">than</st> what is being <st data-num="2749" class="">laid</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2026" class="">builds</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2310" class="">foundation</st> with <st data-num="5557">gold</st>, <st data-num="696">silver</st>, <st data-num="5093" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stones</st>, <st data-num="3586" class="">wood</st>, <st data-num="5528" class="">hay</st>, or <st data-num="2562" class="">straw</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> builder’s<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> will <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5318">plainly seen</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">Day</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="1213" class="">make</st> it <st data-num="1213" class="">clear</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> it will be <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="1381" class="">test</st> <st data-num="3697">what kind</st> of <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> has <st data-num="1510" class="">done</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="3739">what</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> has <st data-num="2026" class="">built</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">survives</st>, he will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> a <st data-num="3408" class="">reward</st>.
If someone’s work is burned up, he will suffer loss. He himself will be saved, but only as through fire.
Do you not know that you are God’s temple and that God’s Spirit lives in you?
If someone destroys God’s temple, God will destroy him. For God’s temple is holy, which is what you are.
Guard against self-deception, each of you. If someone among you thinks he is wise in this age, let him become foolish so that he can become wise.
For the wisdom of this age is foolishness with God. As it is written, “He catches the wise in their craftiness.”
And again, “The Lord knows that the thoughts of the wise are futile.”

<st data-num="5620">So then</st>, <st data-num="3367">no more</st> <st data-num="2744" class="">boasting</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">about</st> <st data-num="444">mere mortals</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="1510">belongs to</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>,

<st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="625" class="">Apollos</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2786" class="">Cephas</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="1764" class="">present</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="3195" class="">future</st>. <st data-num="3956" class="">Everything</st> belongs to <st data-num="4771">you</st>,
and you belong to Christ, and Christ belongs to God.
